text: Tara mithyara jan'ye srabanakari, nisid'dhera bhaksanakari. Ata'eba tara yadi tomara kache ase tabe tadera madhye bicara karo, athaba tadera theke gutiye na'o, ara yadi tumi tadera theke gutiye na'o tabe tara kakhano tomara mote'i ksati karate parabe na. Ara yadi tumi bicara karo tabe tadera madhye bicara karo n'yayaparayanatara sathe. Nihsandeha allah bhalobasena bharasamyaraksakaridera.
